name: Blueberry Pancakes
preparation: In a large bowl, whisk mix with egg, milk, 2 tbsp oil, and cinnamon. Fold in blueberries.

Heat 1 tsp oil in Sauté Pan over medium heat. Working in batches and using 1⁄4 cup as a guide, scoop 3–4 pancakes into pan, leaving space between them. Cook until bubbles appear on top and underside is golden brown, about 3 min. Flip each pancake and cook until bottoms are golden brown, about 1–2 min.
Repeat with remaining oil and batter.
tips: Instead of folding blueberries into the batter, make a smiley face out of the berries after scooping batter into the pan: place 2 berries on top of each pancake for eyes and 4–6 berries for a big smile! Be careful, as the pan will be hot; junior chefs will need some help.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 3⁄4 cup plain 2% Greek yogurt and 1⁄2 cup berries.

products.name: Pancake & Waffle Mix (Pack of 3)
summary: Stack ‘em up: It’s time to make the fluffiest pancakes and waffles ever! Add a few simple ingredients to this gluten free mix and griddle, flip, or press your way through an easy and delicious breakfast.

products.name: Cinnamon (Ground)
summary: A simple blend of organic cinnamon that brings the flavour. Great for baking, desserts, egg nog, or enhancing the taste of Middle Eastern and Indian dishes.

products.name: Sauté Pan
summary: An all-purpose pan to brown, sauté, and simmer—ideal for one pan meals.
